name: Reuben Phillips, Prototypes
description:
Prototype 1: Seasons findings. A simple game where you used different lens to find different objects which relate to each season. 

Prototype 2: Ball in a maze. As the name suggests its a game about a ball in a maze. Move the maze around to get the ball through the maze and into the goal.

Prototype 3: Snow-Race. A simple racing game where two snowmen race each other and also steal snow from each other.

Prototype 4: Xeno-Scream. Simple endless runner where you jump through speak.
